file_content.text: You didn't waste any time, did you, Captain? Bet you ran quicker than a varactyl on hot sand--not that it mattered.
I hate this man.
How does he always manage to get away?
Sorry I can't be there in person, but my sweet, little Neva is very sensitive to violence.
Don't worry though, my friends here will show you a good time.
What's wrong, afraid to face me yourself?
You coward.
Nah, it's just, this way, I can watch you get slaughtered from every conceivable angle. Isn't technology wonderful?
Just give me the hyperdrive and I won't kill you.
This doesn't have to end badly.
You've developed a real talent for comedy. It's a shame the rest of the galaxy will never know.
Captain, say hello to Sergeant Dutonian and his men. They were working freelance for the houses, but now they work for me.
Soon, they'll be dead.
You hired a whole army to kill just us? I'm honored.
The sergeant has graciously accepted my contract--on very short notice, I might add--to vaporize you.
I'm giving you mercenaries one chance to surrender.
Back off, Sergeant.
Skavak didn't tell us you were crazy. We should've charged extra.
How much to leave me in one piece?
I'll make a better offer.
Sorry, we only take one contract at a time.
Once you're buried, I'll pay my respects to Risha and collect what's mine. Goodbye, Captain.
They should've stayed in bed.
That was a mistake. [Attack.]
This is a preview of what I'm gonna do to you, Skavak.
Perfect. [Attack.]
Hit it, men!
